title: Mathieu Laguerre
summary:
Mathieu Laguerre (born 3 February 1999) is a French professional rugby league footballer who plays as a centre for the Catalans Dragons in the Super League. 
He has previously played for Saint-Esteve in the Elite One Championship.
content:
Mathieu Laguerre (born 3 February 1999) is a French professional rugby league footballer who plays as a centre for the Catalans Dragons in the Super League. 
He has previously played for Saint-Esteve in the Elite One Championship.


== Background ==
Laguerre was born in France.


== Career ==
In 2021 he made his Catalans debut in the Super League against Hull Kingston Rovers.
